titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to establish procedures for the handling of claims for compensation for work injuries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1594)

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.name: House Education and Labor
committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 7/25/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law with respect to procedures for handling claims of Federal employees for compensation for work injuries.
